# ğŸ§ª Sample Strategy: Bollinger Band Bounce
 
 ## ğŸ” Overview
 
 This strategy aims to exploit price reversals near the lower Bollinger Band. Ideal for range-bound markets.
 
 ---
 
 ## ğŸ“Œ Entry Conditions
 
 1. Price closes below the lower Bollinger Band
 2. RSI is below 40
 3. Volume is above 20-day average
 
 ---
 
 ## ğŸ“¤ Exit Conditions
 
 - Price reaches the 20-day moving average
 - RSI crosses above 60
 - Stop loss at **-1.5%**
 
 > *Note: Avoid using this strategy during high-volatility news events.*
 
 ---
 
 ## ğŸ“‰ Sample Code
 
 ```js
 function bollingerBounce(data) {
   if (data.price < data.bollingerLower && data.rsi < 40 && data.volume > data.avgVolume) {
     return "Buy";
   }
   if (data.price >= data.sma20 || data.rsi > 60) {
     return "Sell";
   }
   return "Hold";
 }
 ```
 
 ---

 ---

 - Use caution. Apply strict risk management.
